title: Ripple Surprises with Unforeseen 400 Million XRP Release
description: Ripple, the esteemed San Francisco-based blockchain company renowned for its innovations in the digital asset space, recently made waves within the XRP community with an unprecedented move. In a surprising twist, XRP opted for an unscheduled release of a staggering 400 million XRP tokens, equivalent to an estimated $217 million in value.  This departure from […]

title: Fundstrat’s Tom Lee Says Stock Market Not in a Bubble, Predicts Fed Won’t Hesitate To Cut Rates
description:
The head of research at market intelligence firm FundStrat says the stock market most likely has more room to run to the upside. In a new interview with CNBC Television, FundStrat’s Tom Lee says it’s too early to say the stock market’s in a bubble as there is no consensus yet that it isn’t in […]

The post Fundstrat’s Tom Lee Says Stock Market Not in a Bubble, Predicts Fed Won’t Hesitate To Cut Rates appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
